task_group_description_cooking: 5 leuke kooktaakjes die wel tot 19 euro per week kunnen opleveren
task_group_description_cleaning: 5 slimme taakjes die wel tot 15 euro per week kunnen opleveren
task_group_description_pet: 3 taakjes die een beloning van 9 euro kunnen opleveren
task_group_description_play: 7 inspirerende taakjes die 11 euro per week of 80 euro over lange tijd kunnen opleveren
task_group_description_school: 3 leuke taakjes die tot 8 euro per week kunnen opleveren
task_group_description_web: 2 redelijk strikte taken die tot 10 euro per week kunnen opleveren

task_template_description_clean_room: Put things away and clean up
task_template_description_set_table: Put out plates, cutlery, glasses and make it look nice
task_template_description_trash: Take out the garbage bags and throw the, away
task_template_description_profanity: Said swear words or used bad language
task_template_description_candy: Didn't eat any candy all week long
task_template_description_empty_dishwash: Empty the dishwasher so that it can be filled with dirty dishes again
task_template_description_put_away_groce: Help put away groceries and put them in the fridge
task_template_description_dinner_plan: Try to stick to the dinner plan
task_template_description_do_dishes: Scrub and rinse anything that is in the sink
task_template_description_table_manners: Sit properly, use knife and fork and don't play with food
task_template_description_gather_for_don: Gather things that we can give away
task_template_description_loppis: Set up your own flea market where you sell things that aren't used anymore
task_template_title_selling_stand: Set up your own selling stand
task_template_description_selling_stand: Sell something to others on the street
task_template_description_pant: Collect bottles and boxes and recycle. You receive money for the recycling
task_template_description_gym_bag: Prepare your gym bag the day before you have gym class
task_template_description_skipped_class: Didn't go to class even though you should have
task_template_title_phone_at_dinner: Used phone at the dinner table
task_template_description_not_cleaned: If the room isn't cleaned once per week
task_template_description_fight: If you fight with your siblings, at school or with mom and dad
task_template_description_wash_car: Wash the car's outside and clean the inside
task_template_description_late_sleep: If you went to sleep later than agreed
task_template_description_make_bed: Lay the covers neatly and fluff the pillows
task_template_description_immigrants: Gather things that we can donate
task_template_description_help_pet: Take a walk of at least ten minutes
task_template_description_get_mail: Bring the mail, and put it on the table
task_template_description_collect_wash: Collect dirty laundry and put it in the laundry basket
task_template_description_empty_litter: Empty poop box and tidy up
task_template_description_tuck_siblings: Embed the younger siblings in bed
task_template_description_shovel_snow: Shovel the driveway and around the car
task_template_description_news_paper: Put it on the dinner table
task_template_description_clean_play: Pick up the toys and put everything in order
task_template_description_get_night_sibl: Put a younger siblings to bed
task_template_description_snowman: Do not forget the carrot nose!
task_template_description_snowman_mounta: Make a snowman with eyes and nose. Take a picure of you standing next to it.
task_template_description_wood_mountain_: Build a tower of logs, as high as possible. Take a picture of the tower.
task_template_description_angel_mountain: Add in the snow and make a snow angel by moving your arms and legs. Then take a picture of the angel.
task_template_title_junk_mountain_specia: Pick up trash and throw away
task_template_description_junk_mountain_: Find trash and throw it in the nearest trash can, take a picture when you throw it.

goal_group_description_general: Wil je een nieuwe computer of een airboard om de stad mee rond te cruizen? Hier is een lijst met wat andere kinderen willen. Het percentage toont hoe populair de producten waren in 2016!
goal_group_description_trending: Wat is het coolste ding om te hebben op dit moment? Hier heeft u de lijst van de heetste gadgets bij kinderen voor het moment. Het percentage toont hoeveel de producten zijn gegroeid tijdens 2016.
goal_group_description_tips: The Micro Managers is de groep die deze app beter maken. Hier zijn hun favoriete kerstcadeaus.
goal_group_description_game: Speel je graag de laatste computer en video spelletjes, kijk dan hier? Dit is de lijst van meest populaire games van 2016!
goal_group_description_year_5: Hoho! Hier zijn de spelletjes die 5-8 jaar oude kindjes hopen te vinden onder de kerstboom.
goal_group_description_year_9: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do you wish you a new smartphone or perhaps a pair of nice headphones to listen to music? Here is a list that shows what 9-12 year olds would most like to have right now.
goal_group_description_year_13: Wil je mooie kleren, een computer of een camera voor kerstmis? Check out the most popular desires for 13-16 year olds below.
